title: The Paladin's Sin
description: Rordan has spent his entire life training in the Temple to be a Paladin. He is sent to the court of the king to serve as a personal guard. While there, he falls in love with the king's daughter. Their sin is uncovered, and the two lovers will have to face the consequences.Will breaking his sworn oath be worth true love? Can he manage to outwit and survive both a vengeful king and the wrath of the Temple, or will he face the ultimate punishment?
author: Jessica Kemery
